boardgame.description: This entry is for the Living Card Game (LCG) that was developed from the Collectible Card Game (CCG). For the CCG, go to A Game of Thrones CCG_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is no longer a CCG, having transitioned to Fantasy Flight Games' new Living Card Game (LCG) format. Excerpts from FFG's _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;LCG: A Player's Guide_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;A Living Card Game (LCG) is a game that breaks away from the traditional Collectible Card Game (CCG) model by offering a new fixed card distribution method that still offers the same dynamic customizable, expanding, and constantly evolving game play that makes CCG_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s so much fun, but without the blind buy purchase model that has burned out so many players. The end result is an innovative mix that gives you the best of both worlds!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; ...._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The first phase is the release of a LCG Core Set. Every LCG will have an amazing, high quality and widely available entry point packed with content, including high-quality game pieces and immersive game aides to enhance the game. Core Sets are completely self-contained, with multiple decks included, providing a great game experience right out of the box._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Core Sets are followed by monthly installments of expansion packs, each a set of forty fixed cards, providing an ongoing and regular addition to the available card pool. These expansion packs add customization, variety, and an ongoing _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;story_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; to everyone_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s experience with the Core Game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Starting with the Brotherhood Without Banners cycle, expansion packs come in sets of 60 fixed cards - 3 copies of 20 unique cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Starting in November 2011 Fantasy Flight is going to reprint the King's Landing and Defenders of the North Packs to the new 60 card format._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Resources for New Players:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The battle begins here in the A Game of Thrones Card Game. The beloved heroes, villains, locations, and events of George R.R. Martin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s A Song of Ice and Fire saga comes to life in this customizable card game. Players take control of the Starks, Baratheons, Lannisters, or Targaryens and attempt to plot, fight, conspire, manipulate, and bribe their way to victory. The A Game of Thrones card game can be played in a multiplayer _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;melee_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; format with 3-4 players, or in a one-on-one _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;joust_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; format with 2 players. But whichever format you choose, the game has only just begun! In the world of the Living Card Game, hundreds of additional cards are available separately, allowing players to customize the four houses included here, or create entirely original decks. Welcome to A Game of Thrones: The Card Game, where you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll experience George R.R. Martin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Westeros like never before!

Hey everybody, with the reboot upon us I am offering my collection of GoT cards. Here is what you get: - all the cards from the LCG base set (220 cards) - all the tokens from the LCG Core Set (60 Power tokens and 44 Gold Dragon tokens) - the board and the Core Set rulebook - all the cards from the following Deluxe Expansions: - Princes of the Sun (House Martell) - Lords of Winter (House Stark) - Kings of the Storm (House Baratheon) - Lions of the Rock - all the rulebooks for the four Deluxe Expansions - roughly 350 cards from the CCG (mostly from the Ice _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Fire Edition) - CCG rule sheet for the Ice _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Fire Edition *** That gives you round about 900 LCG and 350 CCG cards - all in English. The LCG cards are in pristine conditions as I did not have the time to play the game since I got it. The CCG cards are mostly in very good conditions, but can show some wear at the (black) edges as I played with them back in the day. *** All cards will come packed into three of the Delixe Expansion boxes, which are very sturdy and will protect them inside the shipping box very well. *** On top of that I throw roughly 150 German CCG cards from the Winter Edition and the rules sheet for that edition into the mix. if you cannot use them because you do not speak German, don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t worry, I add them for free so you do not pay anything for them. *** What you do not get: - The LCG Core Set box. As the second Edition of the LCG will come in a much smaller box I will keep my old box as my storage solution (in combination with a Broken Token LCG divider) - The 6 Titel Figures that came with the Core Set. - The fourth Deluxe Set box (Princes of the Sun), as only three boxes are needed for all the cards. If you want to have that one too, tell me and I will add it to the parcel. *** The retail price for the whole LCG package is somewhere between 150 and 300€, the value is, due to the upcoming 2nd edition lower. But you still will make a nice bargain buy buying this whole lot of cards for just 20€ - and then you get those CCG cards on top of that... *** Non smoking and pet-free household
